name: P.R.E.C.I.S.I.O.N
description:
a small "musical" game in which you will have to dodge enemies while you score points and listen to good music.

Gameplay:

you have to dodge enemies with precision while earning music and going to the rhythm of the music.

Controls:

click on any side of the screen and you will go there.

you will also have a click counter

more clicks = more points per enemy
